entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gimli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:55 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gimli 08:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -30.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -33.2°C
Wind: WSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
